tool_description: Searches sacred texts across multiple languages and religious traditions using keywords, phrases, or concepts.

search_terms.description: Keywords or phrases to search for

search_mode.description: Search type: exact, semantic, or conceptual

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-100)

include_context.description: Whether to include surrounding verses for context

sort_by.description: Sort results by relevance, tradition, or chronological

translation_preference.description: Preferred translation style: literal, interpretive, or contemporary

error_messages: Invalid search terms: Provide at least one non-empty search term.
Unsupported tradition: One or more specified traditions are not supported.
Language not available: One or more requested languages are not available for the specified traditions.
Invalid search parameters: max_results must be between 1-100, search_mode must be exact/semantic/conceptual.
Search too broad: Refine search terms to get more specific results.
No results found: No passages found matching the search criteria in the specified traditions.
usage: Provide search_terms and traditions arrays; optionally specify languages, search_mode, max_results, include_context, sort_by, and translation_preference. Returns matching passages with metadata.
